name: get_detection_details
description: Get complete detailed information for a particular detection

detection_id.description: ID of the detection to retrieve details for (minimum: 1)

name: list_detections_with_details
description: List detections with filtering and sorting options with detailed information

ordering.description: Order by last_timestamp, created_datetime, or id. Defaults to ordering by last_timestamp

detection_category.description: Filter by detection category (command, botnet, lateral, reconnaissance, exfiltration, info)

detection_name.description: Filter by detection name (supports partial word match)

state.description: Filter by detection state (active, inactive, fixed, filteredbyai, filteredbyrule)

src_ip.description: Filter by source IP address of the host that generated the detection

is_targeting_key_asset.description: Filter for detections targeting a key asset

limit.description: Maximum number of detections to return (1-1000, default: 1000)

name: get_detection_count
description: Get the total count of detections matching the specified criteria

state.description: Filter by detection state (active, inactive, fixed, filteredbyai, filteredbyrule)

detection_name.description: Filter by detection name (supports partial word match)

src_ip.description: Filter by source IP address of the host that generated the detection

is_targeting_key_asset.description: Filter for detections targeting a key asset

name: get_detection_pcap
description: Get pcap file for a specific detection

detection_id.description: ID of the detection to retrieve pcap for (minimum: 1)

name: list_entity_detections
description: List all detections with full details for a specific entity

state.description: Filter by detection state (active, inactive, fixed, filteredbyai, filteredbyrule)

detection_category.description: Filter by detection category (command, botnet, lateral, reconnaissance, exfiltration, info)

src_ip.description: Filter by source IP address of the host that generated the detection

is_targeting_key_asset.description: Filter for detections targeting a key asset

name: get_detection_summary
description: Get a concise summary of a detection including ID, name, category, timestamp, and status

detection_id.description: ID of the detection to retrieve summary for (minimum: 1)

name: list_detection_ids
description: List detection IDs with filtering and sorting options

ordering.description: Order by last_timestamp, created_datetime, or id

state.description: Filter by detection state (active, inactive, fixed, filteredbyai, filteredbyrule)

detection_category.description: Filter by detection category (command, botnet, lateral, reconnaissance, exfiltration, info)

detection_name.description: Filter by detection name (supports partial word match)

src_ip.description: Filter by source IP address of the host that generated the detection

is_targeting_key_asset.description: Filter for detections targeting a key asset

name: list_entities
description: List entities (hosts & accounts) in Vectra platform based on various filters

entity_type.description: Select type of entity to retrieve (account or host)

ordering.description: Order by urgency_score, last_detection_timestamp, last_modified_timestamp, or name (prefix with - for descending)

name.description: Filter by entity name (supports partial word match)

host_ip.description: Filter by entity IP address (only applicable for host entities)

is_prioritized.description: Filter for prioritized entities or non-prioritized entities

tags.description: Filter for entities with a particular tag

limit.description: Maximum number of entities to return (1-1000, default: 1000)

name: get_account_details
description: Get complete detailed information about a specific account entity

account_id.description: ID of the account in Vectra platform to retrieve details for (minimum: 1)

fields.description: Fields to return in the results (optional)

exclude_fields.description: Fields to exclude in the response object (optional)

include_access_history.description: Include account access history in the response

include_detection_summaries.description: Include detection summaries in the response

include_external.description: Include external data in the response

name: lookup_entity_info_by_name
description: Retrieve information about an entity (account or host) by its name

entity_name.description: Name or partial name of the entity to look up (no spaces allowed)

name: get_host_details
description: Get complete detailed information about a specific host entity

host_id.description: ID of the host entity to retrieve details for (minimum: 1)

name: lookup_host_by_ip
description: Retrieve information about a host entity by its IP address

host_ip.description: IP address of the host to look up (must be valid IPv4 or IPv6)

name: list_assignments
description: List all investigation assignments with optional filtering by timestamp and resolved state

resolved.description: Filter assignments by resolved state (True for resolved, False for unresolved)

created_after.description: List assignments created at or after this timestamp (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS)

name: list_assignments_for_user
description: List all investigation assignments assigned to a user/analyst

user_id.description: Vectra platform user ID to retrieve assignments for

resolved.description: Filter assignments by resolved state (True for resolved, False for unresolved)

name: get_assignment_detail_by_id
description: Retrieve details of a specific investigation assignment

assignment_id.description: ID of the assignment to retrieve (minimum: 1)

name: get_assignment_for_entity
description: Retrieve investigation assignment for a specific account or host

entity_ids.description: List of entity IDs to retrieve assignment for

entity_type.description: Type of entity to retrieve assignment for (host or account)

name: create_assignment
description: Create investigation assignment for an account or host

assign_to_user_id.description: ID of the user to assign the entity to (minimum: 1)

assign_entity_id.description: ID of the entity (account or host) to assign

assign_entity_type.description: Type of the entity (account or host) to assign

name: create_entity_note
description: Add an investigation note to an entity (host or account)

entity_id.description: ID of the entity to add note to (minimum: 1)

entity_type.description: Type of entity to add note to (host or account)

note.description: Note text to add to the entity

name: mark_detection_fixed
description: Marks or unmark detection as fixed

detection_ids.description: List of detection IDs to mark as fixed or not fixed

mark_fixed.description: True to mark as fixed, False to unmark as fixed

name: delete_assignment
description: Unassign or delete an investigation assignment by its ID

assignment_id.description: ID of the assignment to delete (minimum: 1)

name: list_platform_users
description: List users in the Vectra platform

role.description: Filter by user role (admins, auditor, global_analyst, read_only, restricted_admins, security_analyst, setting_admins, super_admins)

last_login_after.description: Filter by last login date in ISO format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS)

email.description: Valid email address of the Vectra platform user to filter by

limit.description: Maximum number of users to return (1-1000, default: 1000)

name: list_lockdown_entities
description: List entities that are currently in lockdown

name: Summarize Detection
description: Get a detailed summary of a specific detection in Vectra AI platform

detection_id.description: ID of the detection to summarize (1-999999)

name: Visualize Entity Detections
description: Visualize relationship of detections related to a specific entity in Vectra AI platform with an interactive graph

entity_id.description: ID of the entity to visualize detections for (1-999999)

graph_theme.description: Theme for the graph visualization (light or dark, default: dark)
